name: Butternut Squash Soup
comments: This is a little spicy, but very tasty. I wouldn't recommend substituting a different kind of squash for this--they all seem to be quite different. You may need to add a little salt to help bring out the flavors.
instructions: Saute onions and garlic in butter. Pour into pot and add all remaining ingredients except cream. Bring to a boil for about 18-20 minutes.
Remove bay leaf. Pour soup into blender, add cream and puree. Serve.
